cinthria.description: Welcome to the town of Cinthria!

prison-vault.long_description: This is a place to store prisoners in the city of Cinthria. You have no idea why you're here. Maybe there's a way to get out...

initial_state.human_readable_description: A large, old wooden door with an inconspicuous keyhole.

unlock.name: unlock
unlock.human_readable_description: Unlocks the door if a key is used. Also adds subzone or zone to list of allowed_moves for anyone who opens the door
unlock.function: lambda self, target: update is_locked to false if one of the params is key_001. In addition, if one of the params is key_001, change the allowed_moves of the target to include (self.state.get("exit_leads_to"))}). However! do not change target's zone or subzone yet.

pass_through.name: pass_through
pass_through.human_readable_description: Adds subzone or zone to list of allowed_moves to anyone who crosses the door's threshold (that is, the target)
pass_through.function: lambda self, target: target.update_state({"allowed_moves": (self.state.get("exit_leads_to"))}). In addition, change the target's subzone to self.state.get("exit_leads_to") if (self.state.get("exit_leads_to")) in target.state.get("existing_places", []) else 'It seems that place does not exist'

when_broken.name: when_broken
when_broken.human_readable_description: What happens when the door is broken
when_broken.function: Do the same thing as the 'unlock' tool

burn.name: burn
burn.human_readable_description: Sets the doormat on fire if exposed to a flame
burn.function: lambda self, flame_source=None: Here’s what happens when you try to burn the doormat. Only if a flame_source is present and it is indeed a lit source of fire and it directly exposes the doormat to flame—meaning the flame is close enough to touch or nearly touch the doormat—then update the doormat’s state so that it is burned, and it becomes a pile of ash in its description, plus the doormat breaks completely. Otherwise, if no flame_source is provided, or it isn’t lit, or it isn’t close enough to directly affect the doormat, return a failure notice saying the doormat isn’t exposed to a flame sufficient to burn it.

consume_fuel.name: consume_fuel
consume_fuel.human_readable_description: Reduces fuel level, deactivates object if depleted
consume_fuel.function: lambda self, amount: self.update_state({"fuel_level": self.state['fuel_level'] - amount}) if 'fuel_level' in self.state and self.state['fuel_level'] > amount else self.update_state({"fuel_level": 0, "is_lit": False}) if 'fuel_level' in self.state else {'success': False, 'message': 'Fuel level not found'}

reveal.name: reveal
reveal.human_readable_description: Makes the key visible and available

the-ravenous-raven.short_description: The most popular only tavern in town
the-ravenous-raven.long_description: Finally sober, huh? Well, let's fix that! The Ravenous Raven is a lively tavern filled with the clatter of mugs, the smell of ale, and the occasional drunken brawl.

initial_state.human_readable_description: A door you don’t feel like opening, leading back to the grim prison-vault.

touch.name: touch
touch.human_readable_description: What happens if you touch the tavern door
touch.function: lambda self, target: 'Nothing much happens, but the target doesn’t feel like going through the door anymore'

initial_state.human_readable_description: A sturdy wooden barrel brimming with 50 liters of frothy ale.

tap.name: tap
tap.human_readable_description: Draws a mug of ale (1 liter) from the barrel
tap.function: lambda self: self.update_state({"volume": self.state["volume"] - 1, "is_full": False, "is_empty": True if (self.state["volume"] - 1 <= 0) else False, "human_readable_description": f"A sturdy wooden barrel containing {self.state['volume'] - 1} liters of frothy ale" if (self.state['volume'] - 1 > 0) else "A sturdy wooden barrel, now empty"}) if self.state['volume'] > 0 else 'The barrel is already empty'

smash.name: smash
smash.human_readable_description: Breaks the barrel, spilling all its contents
smash.function: lambda self: self.update_state({"is_full": False, "is_empty": True, "volume": 0, "human_readable_description": "A broken barrel, its ale soaking the floor"})

check_volume.name: check_volume
check_volume.human_readable_description: Checks how much ale is left in the barrel
check_volume.function: lambda self: f'The barrel contains {self.state["volume"]} liters of ale' if self.state['volume'] > 0 else 'The barrel is empty'

initial_state.human_readable_description: An empty wooden mug, slightly sticky from past use.

fill.name: fill
fill.human_readable_description: Fills the mug with ale if near the barrel
fill.function: lambda self, source: self.update_state({"is_filled": True, "human_readable_description": "A wooden mug filled with frothy ale"}) if source.state.get("contents") == "ale" and source.state.get("is_full") else 'The barrel is empty or missing'

drink.name: drink
drink.human_readable_description: Drinks the contents of the mug
drink.function: lambda self: self.update_state({"is_filled": False, "human_readable_description": "An empty wooden mug, slightly sticky from past use"}) if self.state['is_filled'] else 'The mug is already empty'

initial_state.human_readable_description: An empty wooden mug, slightly sticky from past use.

fill.name: fill
fill.human_readable_description: Fills the mug with ale if near the barrel
fill.function: lambda self, source: self.update_state({"is_filled": True, "human_readable_description": "A wooden mug filled with frothy ale"}) if source.state.get("contents") == "ale" and source.state.get("is_full") else 'The barrel is empty or missing'

drink.name: drink
drink.human_readable_description: Drinks the contents of the mug
drink.function: lambda self: self.update_state({"is_filled": False, "human_readable_description": "An empty wooden mug, slightly sticky from past use"}) if self.state['is_filled'] else 'The mug is already empty'

initial_state.human_readable_description: A heavy oak table scarred from years of use.

flip.name: flip
flip.human_readable_description: Flips the table in a fit of rage or revelry
flip.function: lambda self: self.update_state({"is_sturdy": False, "human_readable_description": "A flipped oak table, now a mess of splinters"})

initial_state.human_readable_description: A rusty lantern casting a warm, flickering glow.

snuff.name: snuff
snuff.function: lambda self: self.update_state({"is_lit": False, "human_readable_description": "A rusty lantern, now dark and cold"})

refill.name: refill
refill.function: lambda self: self.update_state({"fuel_level": 100}) if self.state['is_lit'] == False else 'You can’t refill it while it’s burning'

topics.topic_001: Talk about ale and beer, nothing else
topics.topic_002: Mention the dumb taverner copies the same key for every door

wake.name: wake
wake.function: lambda self: self.update_state({"can_talk": True}) if the patron is offered a drink else return 'the drunkard rambles, dreaming of more ale.'

change_topics.name: change_topics
change_topics.human_readable_description: Gets the patron to stop discussing drinks and talk about something else
change_topics.function: lambda self: If self.state['can_talk'] is True, update self.state['current_topic'] to 'topic_002'.  If self.state['can_talk'] is False, return a rejection like 'The patron’s too far gone to switch subjects—snoring or slurring nonsense.' Success in changing to topic_002 is defined at random.

talk.name: talk
talk.human_readable_description: Speaks a phrase from the current topic
talk.function: lambda self, player: import random; return random.choice(extra_data['topics'][self.state['current_topic']]) if self.state['can_talk'] is True else 'Can't chat right now.' You also instead return a phrase from extra_data['topics'][self.state['current_topic']] that's most adequate, as long as the sentence is in extra_data['topics'][self.state['current_topic']]

topic_001: Ale is good, but have you tried beer?
topic_002: Alright, lad, let me tell a secret: the taverner is dumb
He's so dumb he keeps the same lock for every door. And lazy, too!

bribe_for_information.name: bribe_for_information
bribe_for_information.human_readable_description: Asks the bartender for more information
bribe_for_information.function: lambda self: If self.state['can_talk'] is True, update self.state['current_topic'] to 'topic_002' and adjust self.state['current_dialogue_sentence'] to reflect the new focus if the bartender is offered monetary compensation for the information (at least 1 gold) else return 'I suppose I could discuss this with a wealthy patron...'

change_to_slave_trading_topic.name: change_to_slave_trading_topic
change_to_slave_trading_topic.human_readable_description: Gets the bartender to talk about a more confidencial subject, which is the bartender's slaves to sell
change_to_slave_trading_topic.function: lambda self: If self.state['can_talk'] is True, update self.state['current_topic'] to 'topic_003' and adjust self.state['current_dialogue_sentence'] to reflect the new focus if the player shows open enough and sympathetic to the ideas of topic_002

talk.name: talk
talk.human_readable_description: Speaks a phrase from the current topic
talk.function: lambda self, player: import random; return random.choice(extra_data['topics'][self.state['current_topic']]) if self.state['can_talk'] is True else 'Can't chat right now.' Return a phrase from extra_data['topics'][self.state['current_topic']] that's most adequate.

topic_001: Last night, a customer got so drunk he couldn’t walk straight.
I locked a rowdy drunk in the storeroom to stop him smashing my mugs.
Some of these fools blabber secrets when they’re deep in their cups.
If you want to get me talkin', a coin or two might loosen my tongue about what I’ve heard.
topic_002: The new ban on slave trading is ruining good business around here.
I think it’s unfair they’ve outlawed a man’s right to trade slaves.
Folks used to make decent gold dealing in slaves, back in the day.
I steer clear of that trade now, though—not my concern anymore.
topic_003: I’ve got a few slaves hidden away for someone who’s not too picky.
If you’re quiet about it, I could sell you a sturdy worker.
My slaves are strong and won’t cause you any trouble.
This stays between us—don’t go spreading word of my stock.

temple-in-cinthria.short_description: A sacred temple with ancient carvings on the walls.

market-square.short_description: (not-implemented) A bustling market filled with merchants.
